subject: Football
Deaths (Obituaries)
Olympic Games
lead_paragraph: Matson, who played multiple positions in the N.F.L. and was elected to the Pro Football Hall of Fame in 1972, also won two Olympic medals as a sprinter.
snippet: Matson, who played multiple positions in the N.F.L. and was elected to the Pro Football Hall of Fame in 1972, also won two Olympic medals as a sprinter.
